sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM SECURITY_PRINCIPAL WHERE 1=1 AND PRINCIPAL_TYPE='G' PARENT_ID=#parentId# SHORT_PATH LIKE #shortPathCond#||'%' PRINCIPAL_NAME LIKE #principalNameCond#||'%'
SELECT COUNT(*) cnt FROM SECURITY_PRINCIPAL WHERE PRINCIPAL_TYPE='G' AND SHORT_PATH=#shortPath#

SELECT tb2.* FROM ( SELECT tb1.*, rownum rnum FROM ( SELECT PRINCIPAL_ID FROM SECURITY_PRINCIPAL WHERE 1=1 AND PRINCIPAL_TYPE='G' PARENT_ID=#parentId# SHORT_PATH LIKE #shortPathCond#||'%' PRINCIPAL_NAME LIKE #principalNameCond#||'%' ORDER BY $sortColumn$ $sortMethod$ ) tb1 ) tb2 WHERE tb2.rnum BETWEEN #startRow# AND #endRow#
SELECT PRINCIPAL_ID FROM SECURITY_PRINCIPAL WHERE PRINCIPAL_TYPE='G'
SELECT PRINCIPAL_ID, SHORT_PATH, PRINCIPAL_NAME FROM SECURITY_PRINCIPAL WHERE PRINCIPAL_TYPE='G' AND SHORT_PATH IN ($samples$)
SELECT PRINCIPAL_ID FROM SECURITY_PRINCIPAL WHERE 1=1 AND PRINCIPAL_TYPE='G' =#parentId#

SELECT PRINCIPAL_ID,PARENT_ID,SHORT_PATH,PRINCIPAL_NAME,THEME,SITE_NAME,DEFAULT_PAGE,PRINCIPAL_TYPE,PRINCIPAL_ORDER,CREATION_DATE,MODIFIED_DATE,PRINCIPAL_INFO01,PRINCIPAL_INFO02,PRINCIPAL_INFO03,PRINCIPAL_DESC FROM SECURITY_PRINCIPAL WHERE 1=1 AND PRINCIPAL_ID=#principalId#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO SECURITY_PRINCIPAL ( PRINCIPAL_ID,PARENT_ID,SHORT_PATH,FULL_PATH,PRINCIPAL_NAME,CLASSNAME,IS_MAPPING_ONLY,IS_ENABLED,THEME,SITE_NAME,DEFAULT_PAGE,PRINCIPAL_TYPE,PRINCIPAL_ORDER,CREATION_DATE,MODIFIED_DATE,PRINCIPAL_INFO01,PRINCIPAL_INFO02,PRINCIPAL_INFO03,PRINCIPAL_DESC ) VALUES ( #principalId#,#parentId#,#shortPath#,'/sample/'||#shortPath#,#principalName#,'com.saltware.enview.security.InternalSamplePrincipalImpl',0,1,#theme#,#siteName#,#defaultPage#,'G',(SELECT count(PRINCIPAL_ID) FROM SECURITY_PRINCIPAL WHERE PARENT_ID=#parentId#),#creationDate#,#modifiedDate#,#principalInfo01#,#principalInfo02#,#principalInfo03#,#principalDesc# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE SECURITY_PRINCIPAL SET PRINCIPAL_ID=#principalId#,PARENT_ID=#parentId#,SHORT_PATH=#shortPath#,PRINCIPAL_NAME=#principalName#,THEME=#theme#,SITE_NAME=#siteName#,DEFAULT_PAGE=#defaultPage#,PRINCIPAL_ORDER=#principalOrder#,MODIFIED_DATE=#modifiedDate#,PRINCIPAL_INFO01=#principalInfo01#,PRINCIPAL_INFO02=#principalInfo02#,PRINCIPAL_INFO03=#principalInfo03#,PRINCIPAL_DESC=#principalDesc# WHERE 1=1 AND PRINCIPAL_ID=#principalId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM SECURITY_PRINCIPAL WHERE 1=1 AND PRINCIPAL_ID=#principalId#
